About Us

We are the perfect partner for your

Product & Brand Marketing

Our integrated approach combines Outdoor Media Buying/Planning for strategic brand positioning, captivating Messaging via content creation and cutting-edge Digital Marketing techniques to maximize your online visibility and enhance overall customer engagement.

Outdoor Media Buying/Planning

Led Boards - Bus Branding - Bus Shelters - Airport Branding - InMall Branding - Static Billboards - Lampposts - Brand Activations, etc.

Messaging

Written Communications - Social Media Content - Static Outdoor Campaigns - Ui/Ux Design - Ui/Ux Writing - Content Creation - Official Blog Posting - Product Briefs, etc.

Digital Marketing

Seo - Pay Per Click - In Apps - Social Media Ads/Management - E Mail Marketing - Influencer Marketing, etc.

Brand Affilation

We have/had cooperate relationships with the below mentioned, at different times:

Audiomack is Nigeria’s most popular music streaming platform. We worked with Audiomack Africa to increase their brand awareness in Nigeria, through bus branding in 4 major cities.

Paystack - we played an advisory role in their procurement of OOH sites in the last quarter of 2020.

Avila - We advised our friends at Avila, on their interest in outdoor advertising, bus-branding especially.

Landmark OHMS Ltd - former employer of our founder, who still partner with us under different capacities.

Bumpa - We advised our friends at Bumpa, on their interest in outdoor advertising, LED billboards especially

BNXN - We have worked with BNXN’s management in various capacities to help increase music streams across platforms

Ellance - Our partners for designs, content creation and digital advertising.

... and here is You - new client, enthusiastic to give us a try
